reviews.review: Thought it was great.   Totally delivered and left a lot of questions for the sequel.

One of the best superhero films to date.

Great characters, good villain, interesting twists and ending. It should be said that in a film with a cast this big, certain people are going to shine more than others, but even people in supporting roles did a good job. It was long though and intense almost too much, but still as good as it could have been.

It was good to see Thor at his best, probably the best he's ever been on screen, his story his motivations,  all were well done. If you are a thor fan, you will like this film. The same could be same of Iron man, peter park er and vision. It was a shame that the hulk had so little screen time and that bruce banner was stuck using the hulk buster which he clearly was inexperienced in using, but that didn't detract that much from the film.

Good to see Wakanda play a pivotal role in being at the forefront of the battle.
Very good movie was highy impressed
Nailed the Epic part of it. Some of Thanosâ€™s selective use of the Infinity stones was puzzling. Plot holes? Aside from that, as a comics fan, to me it was generally fantastic.

This gets you more emotional than other film out there. The pacing is fantastic with non stop action that I was hoping to see. As well as the fact that Marvel decided to go beyond expectations and let the villain win spectacularly. This is Thanos' story and they make him believable and relatable as good as it gets along with how done to Earth he really is, and not just pure evil. Thank you to the directors for a film movie history will never forget.

As a Marvel fan, I enjoyed the first part of Infinity War. I can see why non Marvel fans struggle to understand the multiple storylines and how each character figures into the whole. Good one liners, especially the name Thor has for Rocket.   My little one was ready for some of the deaths but others took her off guard. Interesting villain, more back story would be awesome..
Exciting and enjoyable popcorn blockbuster with characters in which, collectively, we've been invested in for decades.  Well balanced stories split between all your favorites from the Marvel realm.
Fantastic movie its my favorite superhero movie

It was a joy to watch this movie in the cinema and it was indeed visual a masterpiece. A big applause to the visual effect supervisors. But the end of the movie was really a whole lot of mess. The movie should have end when Thanos snipped with his finger, while Thor tried to stop him. Then it would have ended with a cliffhanger and the audicence was more interest in watching the sequel.
Truly the best of the MCU movies ever.
